title: Assassins should be renamed to Escapists
body: I rarely see a good assassination in game anymore.  I remember the days when assassins could actually flank and get picks then escape by punishing squishies out of position.  Lately, I only see assassins on side lanes using their "assassination" mobility to avoid getting caught.  I'm starting to feel we should rename assassins to Escapists.  Let's face it, there isn't a lot of assassination going on in the game currently.
